StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: A senior-level Information Technology Manager with extensive experience in Program Management, Project Management, and Software Quality Assurance. Expertise in developing applications for Banking, Lending and Investments environments. Certified in Project Management by the Project Management Institute. Ability to bridge business and technology goals to provide productive solutions. Well-organized individual with proven track record of implementing standards, procedures, and processes that improve technology and business performance. Exceptional communicator with emphasis on building strong client relationships. Solid management skills with emphasis on leading and motivating individuals to maximize levels of productivity and forming a strong team environment. Quick learner that rapidly adapt to changing technologies and environments.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Michael R. Carlson is a resident of Deer Park, NY, US. He has been working in the Accountancy occupational sector for more than 18 years. During his last employment he was working as an Application Services Manager at III. Michael has an extensive management experience (16 years) with exposure to senior management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2011 for 36 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Application Services Manager/Vice President at III. Since 2007 for 48 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Senior Development Project/Program Manager/Vice President at CITI Private Bank. Since 2003 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a Software Quality Manager/Vice President at Smith Barney. Since 1996 for 84 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Area Manager/Vice President at Smith Barney.
